subject: Pro Bowl
lead_paragraph: San Diego Chargers running back LaDainian Tomlinson withdrew from the Pro Bowl, paving the way for Baltimore Ravens running back Willis McGahee to make his first appearance in the game. McGahee earned a spot on the American Conference team because Tomlinson has a sprained knee.
